actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Metro Air Conditioning, Inc., Blair Scott Stephens, and Freddie Large.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay specified sums to a named corporation and two named individuals in full satisfaction of claims against the United States arising out of alleged misrepresentations made to them by the Veterans' Administration.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Metro Air Conditioning, Inc., Blair Scott Stephens, and Freddie Large.
